structure.unit: ARTICLE XXIX. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY HEALTH FACILITIES AUTHORITY

text.section:
Sec. 2-260. Declaration of need.
The Board of County Commissioners hereby finds and declares that there is a need for a Miami-Dade County Health Facilities Authority to function in Miami-Dade County so as to assist in the development and maintenance of the health facilities of Miami-Dade County.
